parameters.name: DatasetName
parameters.description: The name of the dataset. You can obtain the name of the dataset from the response of the [CreateDataset](~~478160~~) operation.

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: The file for which you want to create a metadata index. The value must be in the JSON format.

parameters.name: Notification
parameters.description: The notification settings. For information about the asynchronous notification format, see [Asynchronous message examples](~~2743997~~).

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. You can obtain the name of the project from the response of the [CreateProject](~~478153~~) operation.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: The custom user information, which is returned in an asynchronous notification. The maximum length of a notification is 2048 bytes.
